children.text: There is a visible blemish in the finished timber flooring.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 14.02 Timber flooring, states that
‘Ghosting, where blemishes appear beneath the finish coat, is defective when visible from a normal viewing position’.
This will need to be rectified in accordance with the above requirement, which will require the entire area be sanded and re-finished.
